name: MamaSchack
0:
”Alexa open Mama Shack”
”Alexa ask Mama Shack how do I make latkes”
”Alexa ask Mama Shack what is the recipe for chicken soup”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mama shack
des:
A useful app that puts Jewish recipes and everyday recipes just a query away. You can ask Mama Schack how to make chicken soup, matzo balls, latkes (potato pancakes), chopped liver, boiled eggs, and roast chicken.

Mama Schack is learning new recipes and new information all the time. You can help make Mama Schack better by emailing suggestions to makegizmos@gmail.com.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
